emptyState.title: No groups yet
emptyState.subtitle: Join or create groups to start meeting people

explore.title: Explore Groups
explore.subtitle: Meet people with similar interests and affiliations

empty.title: No groups found
empty.subtitle: New groups will be added soon!

alerts.alreadyJoined: You have already joined this group.
alerts.joinRestricted:
Joining is currently restricted for gender balance.
Please try again later.
alerts.joinConfirm:
Do you want to join "{{name}}" group?

After joining, you can communicate anonymously with other group members.
alerts.error: An error occurred while joining the group.

create.title: Create Group
create.accessibilityHint: Navigate to screen where you can create a new group

joinInvite.title: Group Invitation
joinInvite.confirmMessage:
Do you want to join this group?
After joining, you can anonymously match with group members.
joinInvite.noticeText:
‚Ä¢ Joining groups is free
‚Ä¢ You can leave groups anytime
‚Ä¢ You may be removed for inappropriate behavior

myGroups.title: My Groups
myGroups.subtitle: Manage the groups you've joined and created

leaveGroup.title: Leave Group
leaveGroup.message:
Are you sure you want to leave "{{groupName}}" group?

After leaving, you'll need to rejoin to participate in group activities.

manageGroup.title: Group Management
manageGroup.message: Group management features will be added soon.

viewGroup.title: Notice
viewGroup.message: Group detail view feature will be added soon.

emptyJoined.title: No joined groups
emptyJoined.subtitle: Explore groups and join ones that interest you!

emptyCreated.title: No created groups
emptyCreated.subtitle: Create new groups and meet people!

groupTypes.instanceDesc: Temporary groups for events or occasions

createGroup.title: Create New Group
createGroup.groupNamePlaceholder: Enter group name (e.g., Seoul Book Club)
createGroup.groupDescriptionPlaceholder: Describe your group's purpose and activities
createGroup.minimumMembersHelper: Matching will be activated when this minimum is reached

validation.nameMinLength: Group name must be at least 2 characters
validation.nameMaxLength: Group name must be less than 30 characters
validation.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
validation.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 200 characters
validation.locationRequired: Location is required for location groups

errors.fillAllFields: Please fill in all required fields correctly

guidelines.title: Group Creation Guidelines
guidelines.content:
‚Ä¢ Create groups with positive and constructive purposes
‚Ä¢ Discriminatory or inappropriate content is prohibited
‚Ä¢ Write clear and easy-to-understand names and descriptions
‚Ä¢ Matching will be activated automatically when minimum members are reached
‚Ä¢ Group admins can moderate inappropriate members

detail.title: Group Details
detail.inviteCodeDescription: Share this code with friends to invite them to the group

leaveConfirm.title: Leave Group
leaveConfirm.message:
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
You will also be removed from the group chat.

inviteCodeRequiresJoin.title: Notice
inviteCodeRequiresJoin.message: You need to join the group first to generate an invite code.

chatRequiresJoin.title: Notice
chatRequiresJoin.message: You need to join the group first to participate in the chat.

qrJoin.title: QR Code Group
qrJoin.permissionDescription:
Camera permission is required to
scan QR codes and join groups
qrJoin.scanDescription:
Scan the group QR code generated by
other users to join their group
qrJoin.scanInstruction: Align the QR code within the frame
qrJoin.generateDescription:
Allow other users to scan and
easily join your group
qrJoin.qrExpiry: ‚ö†Ô∏è This QR code expires in 5 minutes
qrJoin.selectGroupDescription:
Please select a group from the group list
to generate a QR code
qrJoin.expiredMessage: The QR code has expired. Please request a new QR code.
qrJoin.joinMessage: Do you want to join "{{groupName}}" group?
qrJoin.joinError: An error occurred while joining the group.
qrJoin.invalidMessage: This is not a valid Glimpse group QR code.

main.title: Groups
main.subtitle: Manage the groups you've joined and created

leave.title: Leave Group
leave.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to leave this group? If the group creator leaves, the group may be deleted.

errors.alreadyJoined: You have already joined this group

info.title: How to Use Group Numbers
info.description:
Group numbers are temporary 6-digit codes
that allow you to easily join groups
info.privacy: Only group admins can generate group numbers
